snippet.title: Mafia: Definitive Edition - Coming September 25
snippet.description:
Re-made from the ground up, Mafia: Definitive Edition offers a faithful remake of the original's acclaimed story with dramatically improved and expanded visuals and gameplay.

Available September 25. Pre-order on its own or as part of the #MafiaTrilogy.

Pre-order now at https://mafiagame.com/buy

Subscribe and follow for more exclusive Mafia Trilogy info:
Facebook: https://facebook.com/mafiagame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mafiagame
Instagram: https://instagram.com/2k
Website: https://mafiagame.com
